_xResult.title: Seville Row Linen Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made summer tank top with hand-crafted pattern
_xResult.longdesc:
When you think "basic white shirt" it's usually boring, right? Not this lovely pullover top by Aiste in gorgeous and comfortable linen. What makes this shell top unique is that it's handmade from linen that has been textured with soft seams to give it unique structure and shape.



The shirt is custom made to your measurements in any size. Scoop neck, pullover style, sleeveless. Also note that this shirt is made by default with an open-weave linen that can look and feel semi-transparent depending on the color. If you'd like a tighter weave, please reach out to us for options!

 


Made of soft prewashed linen.



Aiste says, "My goal is to establish a mutually harmonious relationship with my clients while designing individual pieces for them. This special bond between an artist and her muse is inspiring as it stimulates and motivates creative energy. My inherent intuition helps to maintain this connection; I want people to trust me and give me the freedom to create an image for them. I have developed a distinctive "fit to size" technique that allows a customer quick access to new models and designs. Each and every client is a riddle that I must solve! I adore this aspect of my work. Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly -- wherever you go, simply pack them in your travel bag. No additional ironing is needed. -With love, Aiste"

properties.propvalue: Hand wash cold or dry clean. Do not machine dry.
